A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is the biggest insult to long time fans. The way they handled Luke's character is worthy of a lynch mob. Disney needs to implode. I am so tired of (((them))) taking beloved franchises and turning them into shitty SJW pandering messes. It's nothing short of a big middle finger to both long time fans and white people in general. If you like this movie and over the age of 16\, you should be ashamed.
